original_text:
Yes, he loved his people,
    all his holy ones were in his hand;
so they followed in your steps,
    receiving direction from you,
korean_text: 여호와께서 백성을 사랑하시나니 모든 성도가 그의 수중에 있으며 주의 발 아래에 앉아서 주의 말씀을 받는도다

sentences.original_text: all his holy ones were in his hand;
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 거룩한 자들이 그의 손 안에 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: so they followed in your steps,
